items.text: The 5-column layout is feeling cramped on smaller screens. Can we make the columns scroll horizontally instead of squeezing them all in? Also the column headers need more contrast.
items.author: user

replies.author: claude
replies.text: Done — columns now scroll horizontally on narrow screens and header contrast is bumped up.

items.text: The pipeline card looks good but can we add a subtle gradient on the progress bar instead of a flat color? Also make the priority badge slightly bigger, it's hard to read on smaller screens.
items.author: user

replies.author: claude
replies.text: Done — gradient added to the progress bar and priority badge size bumped up. Check it out.
